item.title: 美国国务院电报称，该机构使用人工智能帮助招聘小组配备人员
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份周一发布的电报显示，美国国务院将使用人工智能聊天机器人来帮助其挑选对晋升和调动进行年度审查的人员。【原文：The U.S. State Department will use an artificial intelligence chatbot to help it select the people who will perform annual reviews of promotions and moves, according to a cable issued Monday and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 阿根廷启动 20 亿美元回购协议以增加储备金
item.description: 阿根廷中央银行周一表示，将启动一项高达 20 亿美元的回购协议（即 REPO），以增加其外汇储备。【原文：Argentina's central bank will launch a repurchase agreement of up to $2 billion, known as a REPO, to boost its foreign reserves, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 全食供应商 United Natural Foods 称网络事件中断了运营
item.description: 联合自然食品公司（United Natural Foods Inc）周一表示，该公司是美国最大的食品杂货分销商之一，其客户包括全食超市（Whole Foods）。【原文：United Natural Foods Inc one of the largest U.S. grocery distributors whose clients include Whole Foods, took certain systems offline in recent days after the discovery of unauthorized activity on internal networks, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日 伦敦来电，股市走高
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司的 Naveen Chopra 加入 Roblox 担任财务主管
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）首席财务官纳文-乔普拉（Naveen Chopra）于本周一卸任，加入视频游戏公司 Roblox 担任财务主管。【原文：Paramount Global's chief financial officer Naveen Chopra stepped down from his role on Monday to join video gaming company Roblox as its finance head.】

item.title: 迪士尼将为 NBCU 持有的 Hulu 股份额外支付 4.387 亿美元
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼公司周一表示，将再支付 4.387 亿美元购买 NBCU 在 Hulu 中的权益。【原文：Walt Disney said on Monday it would pay an additional $438.7 million to purchase NBCU's interest in Hulu.】

item.title: OpenAI 的年化收入达到 100 亿美元，高于 2024 年 12 月的 55 亿美元
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，截至 6 月，该公司的年化收入飙升至 100 亿美元，在人工智能应用蓬勃发展的背景下，公司有望实现全年目标。【原文：OpenAI said on Monday that its annualized revenue run rate surged to $10 billion as of June, positioning the company to hit its full-year target amid booming AI adoption.】

item.title: 特朗普表示不会放弃埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "服务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他不会放弃埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司提供的 "星链"（Starlink）服务，并称这是一项很好的服务。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that he would not drop the Starlink service made by Elon Musk's SpaceX company, calling it a good service.】

item.title: 据报纸报道，轮胎制造商米其林将关闭位于墨西哥中部的工厂
item.description: 据《Reforma》周一援引米其林当地部门的声明报道，轮胎制造商米其林将于今年年底关闭位于墨西哥中部克雷塔罗州的一家工厂。【原文：Tire maker Michelin is set to close a plant in the state of Queretaro in central Mexico by the end of this year, newspaper Reforma reported on Monday, citing a statement from the company's local unit.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 批准默克公司用于婴儿的 RSV 抗体
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周一批准了默克公司的预防性抗体注射液，用于保护一岁以下婴儿在首个RSV季节免受呼吸道合胞病毒感染。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Monday approved Merck's preventive antibody shot to protect infants up to one year of age from respiratory syncytial virus during their first RSV season, the company said.】

item.title: 以下是苹果公司在年度开发者大会上发布的所有信息
item.description: 苹果公司周一发布了其所有设备的操作系统升级，包括视觉元素的全面调整、软件更新的全新命名系统以及苹果智能套件的新功能。【原文：Apple unveiled upgrades to operating systems across its devices on Monday, including overhauled visual elements, a fresh naming system for software updates and new features in its Apple Intelligence suite.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的联邦航空局官员称，该机构面临严重的领导力和信任问题
item.description: 路透社看到的一份参议院调查问卷显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的联邦航空管理局负责人称，该机构面临严重的领导力、信任和文化问题。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's nominee to head the Federal Aviation Administration says the agency faces serious leadership, trust and culture issues, according to a Senate questionnaire seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据 Handelsblatt 报报道，T-Mobile 美国公司老板将提前离职
item.description: 据德国《商报》（Handelsblatt）周一报道，德国电信（Deutsche Telekom）旗下增长迅速、利润丰厚的子公司 T-Mobile U.S. 的负责人将在现有合同结束前离职。【原文：The head of T-Mobile U.S. , the fast-growing and profitable subsidiary of Germany's Deutsche Telekom , is due to step aside before the end of his current contract, German newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Monday.】

item.title: 即将举行的美国国债拍卖是重要的情绪测试
item.description: 本周的美国国债拍卖比往常更受关注，因为这是对美国资产市场情绪的考验，虽然投资者看起来热衷于购买短期和中期债券，但对长期债券的胃口却比较谨慎。【原文：U.S. Treasury auctions of notes and bonds this week are even more in focus than usual as tests of market sentiment on U.S. assets, and while investors look like keen buyers of short and medium-term debt, appetite at the long end is more dicey.】

item.title: 巴拉圭总统的 X 账户很可能在比特币计划中遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 巴拉圭政府周一表示，总统圣地亚哥-佩纳的 X 账户很可能遭到了黑客攻击，因为这位领导人似乎在推动加密货币比特币的交易。【原文：Paraguay's government on Monday said that President Santiago Pena's X account had likely been hacked after the leader appeared to promote trading of cryptocurrency Bitcoin.】

item.title: 加拿大联合黄金公司可能会考虑萨迪奥拉矿的供电协议方案
item.description: 加拿大矿商联合黄金公司（Allied Gold）首席执行官周一在接受路透社采访时表示，随着金价飙升和新机会的出现，该公司可能会考虑为其马里萨迪奥拉矿山的供电协议提供其他选择。【原文：Canadian miner Allied Gold could look at alternative options for a power supply deal at its Sadiola mine in Mali following a surge in gold prices and the emergence of new opportunities, its CEO told Reuters in an interview on Monday.】

item.title: 从时代公司到 Discovery：华纳兄弟的解体揭示了并购史上的种种弊端
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）是 HBO 和 CNN 的母公司，该公司周一表示将拆分为两家公司，这是其数十年高风险合并和拆分历史中的最新转折。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery , home to HBO and CNN, said on Monday it would split into two companies, the latest twist in its decades-long history of high-stakes mergers and breakups.】

item.title: Stellantis 为都灵工厂提供自愿裁员计划
item.description: Stellantis 汽车制造商周一表示，继在意大利其他工厂推出自愿裁员计划后，该公司已开始对意大利都灵米拉菲奥里工厂的 610 名工人实施自愿裁员计划。【原文：Stellantis has started a voluntary redundancy plan for 610 workers at its Mirafiori plant in Turin, Italy, after introducing the scheme at other Italian facilities, the automaker said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国关税生效，美国 5 月海运集装箱进口下滑
item.description: 供应链技术提供商笛卡尔周一表示，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统145%的关税生效，5月份美国从中国海运进口的商品同比下降了28.5%，为大流行病以来的最大降幅。【原文：U.S. seaborne imports of goods from China dropped 28.5% year-over-year in May, the sharpest decline since the pandemic, as President Donald Trump's 145% tariffs took hold, supply chain technology provider Descartes said on Monday.】

item.title: 加拿大竞争局就价格和折扣起诉 DoorDash
item.description: 加拿大竞争局周一表示，它正在起诉 DoorDash 及其加拿大子公司，指控它们宣传误导性价格和折扣。【原文：Canada's Competition Bureau said on Monday it was suing DoorDash and its Canadian subsidiary for allegedly advertising misleading prices and discounts.】

item.title: 贝莱德称反垄断指控 "前所未有、不靠谱、无依据"
item.description: 贝莱德的一名律师周一称，共和党领导的各州提出的反垄断指控 "前所未有、不靠谱且缺乏依据"，并称这些指控未能证明公司与行业气候组织的合作如何干扰了市场竞争。【原文：An attorney for BlackRock called antitrust claims by Republican-led states "unprecedented, unsound and unsupported" on Monday and said they had failed to show how the firms' involvement with industry climate groups interfered with market competition.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 5 月份通胀预期趋缓
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布的一份报告称，5月份美国人对未来通胀走势的忧虑有所缓解，同时他们对个人财务状况也更加乐观。【原文：Americans’ anxiety about the future path of inflation eased in May, as they also grew more upbeat about the state of their personal finances, a report released on Monday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said.】

item.title: 美国 4 月份批发库存量上调
item.description: 由于预期特朗普政府将征收关税而囤积处方药，4 月份美国批发库存有所增加。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories increased in April amid stockpiling of prescription medication in anticipation of tariffs from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 独家报道：证交会计划称现有裁员有助于实现两性平等办公室目标
item.description: 根据路透社获得的一份规划文件，华尔街的最高监管机构在 3 月份告诉白宫，它已经在通过自愿裁员来满足特朗普总统和埃隆-马斯克对精简政府的要求方面取得了实质性进展。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator told the White House in March it had already made substantial progress toward meeting President Trump and Elon Musk's demands for leaner government via voluntary workforce reductions, according to a planning document obtained by Reuters.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在宾夕法尼亚州投资 200 亿美元扩建云基础设施
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周一表示，它计划在宾夕法尼亚州投资至少 200 亿美元，用于扩建数据中心基础设施，这是该科技巨头为扩展人工智能技术所投入的数十亿美元的补充。【原文：Amazon.com said on Monday it plans to invest at least $20 billion in Pennsylvania to expand data center infrastructure, adding on to the billions of dollars the technology giant has committed to the expansion of AI technology.】

item.title: Synchrony Financial 将再次发行沃尔玛信用卡
item.description: 消费金融服务公司 Synchrony Financial 周一表示，沃尔玛已再次与 Synchrony Financial 合作发行这家零售巨头的信用卡。【原文：Walmart has once again partnered with Synchrony Financial to issue the retail giant's credit card, the consumer financial services company said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Afterpay 称一些 BNPL 用户被告知关闭账户，然后被出售信用卡
item.description: 澳大利亚 BNPL 服务提供商 Afterpay 周二表示，该公司的一些客户被要求关闭 "即买即付 "账户，以获得抵押贷款资格，并在获得资格后获得信用卡，这凸显了消费金融子行业的激烈竞争。【原文：Some customers of Australia's Afterpay have been asked to close buy-now-pay-later accounts to qualify for a mortgage and offered a credit card upon qualification, the BNPL provider said on Tuesday, underscoring fierce competition in the consumer finance sub-sectors.】

item.title: 上市数量创十年新低，澳大利亚监管机构试行更快的 IPO 流程
item.description: 澳大利亚证券监管机构周二表示，将试行改革，通过落实早前审查中提出的建议，允许散户投资者更快地参与首次公开募股，从而加快创十年新低的首次公开募股速度。【原文：Australia's securities regulator said on Tuesday it would trial changes to speed up initial public offerings that are at a decade low by implementing recommendations from earlier reviews and allowing faster access for retail investors.】

item.title: 特朗普对双引擎 F-55 战斗机的设想面临现实考验
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，由于成本和工程方面的现实问题，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对洛克希德-马丁公司新型双引擎版 F-35 战斗机的设想可能需要缩减。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's vision of a new, twin-engine version of Lockheed Martin's F-35 fighter jet may need to be scaled back due to cost and engineering realities, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行：融资成本上升导致美国企业违约增加
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）在周一的一份报告中称，由于经济增长疲软或利息支出增加的压力，风险较高的美国公司明年的违约率将上升。【原文：The rate at which riskier U.S. companies default will increase next year, Deutsche Bank said in a Monday note, as a result either of weakening economic growth or the pressure of higher interest payments.】
